channel.title: Alicloud on Ambar Mehrotra
channel.description: Recent content in Alicloud on Ambar Mehrotra

item.title: Aws Alicloud Vpn Setup Terraform
item.description: Github Repository: tf-aws-alicloud-vpn Note: This is not a guide on the internals of a Virtual Private Network. Rather, this post outlines how to setup a VPN connection between AWS and Alicloud. This guide uses Terraform for making API calls and state management. You can chose to use any HTTP client or aws and alicloud CLIs as well for making the same API calls and end up with a working VPN connection.
